generated_content.title: Paranormal Mysteries in Salem, Massachusetts - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the infamous sites of Salem's dark past, including the Salem Witch Trials and haunted locations like the Old Burying Point Cemetery. Visit the Salem Witch Museum to learn about the trials that took place here.
